name: SinglePass Curl X 1.25” Ceramic Extra-Long Barrel Curling Iron
about: What it is:A professional 1.25 curling iron featuring an extra-long barrel and Digital T3 SinglePass® Technology for fast, one-pass styling with lasting results..Hair Texture:Straight, Wavy, Curly, and Coily.Hair Type:Fine, Medium, and Thick.Hair Concerns:- Volumizing.Key Benefits:- 1.25 Clip Barrel: Creates soft, lived-in curls and waves with a smooth, glossy finish.What Else You Need to Know:This curling iron’s extra-long barrel and ProGlide clip design team up to style wide sections, long hair, or hard-to-reach areas in one quick, smooth pass. Digital T3 SinglePass® Technology ensures perfect heat precision—no hot or cool spots—for curls and waves that last.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Clamp the ends of a one- to two-inch section of hair and roll up toward the roots. Hold for a few seconds, then release.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Great, does its job. However, the metal part at the start of the barrel can rip out some hairs… I like the cool top because it makes it easy to hold.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was so excited to get this curling iron as a long haired gal who wears my hair wavy daily, but this was a disappointment! Unfortunately the curls do not hold, and there was significantly more frizz using this than my cheaper curling irons.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This was the first T3 product I ever tried, and I’m very impressed. This curling iron heats up quickly, creates beautiful curls that actually last in my fine wavy hair.   https://app.im.skeepers.io/c/hgxzm/r/hbw21

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have straight fine hair, so it’s hard for me to find a curling iron that I love and this T3 doesn’t disappoint! I love the heat settings and the longer barrel on this for my long hair. Must have!!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This curling iron is amazing. I have layers in my hair so I’m always looking for a new way to style my hair. I’m obsessed with the 90s blowouts and the 70s Farrah Fawcett hair. I love this curling iron. I actually have two others of their line and I adore every single one. This one is great for more of a beach wave look or a more tight curl but either way if you buy these, you will absolutely love them as much as I do.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve used multiple T3 products and always enjoyed them. This is no exception. These curling irons make my hair so smooth and the curls hold so well. I also love that my hair doesn’t get caught in the barrel and it doesn’t rip my hair

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: T3 curling irons are some of my favorites, and the extra long barrel has been amazing! I have long hair, so this has made curling my hair a breeze! The design is sleek and as always, the color is super luxurious!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This curling iron doesn’t just look luxe ! It actually does an amazing job with very minimum effort. It’s beginner friendly and warms up really quickly. Got my hair all curled nicely in a few seconds per section and also holds the curls really well . I would def recommend trying it out !

reviews.review_title: The perfect curling companion for effortless waves
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: If you’re looking for a curling iron that delivers precision and speed while keeping your curls soft and healthy-looking, the T3 SinglePass Curl X 1.25” is a must-try. With its extra-long barrel, this curling iron is ideal for those with longer hair (like me!) or anyone who needs to tackle hard-to-reach sections without fumbling. The first time I used it, I was immediately impressed with how quickly it styled larger sections of my hair—it’s like it just knows how to work with your hair.  One of my favorite features is the ProGlide clip design, which makes it incredibly easy to maneuver through my thick, wavy hair. The clip glides without snagging, which is a huge plus when you’re trying to create those smooth, glossy curls. And can we talk about the 9 heat settings? Whether you have fine hair or a thicker texture like mine, there’s a setting to match your specific hair needs. I used a higher heat setting and still felt confident knowing the CeraGloss™ ceramic barrel was helping to maintain the shine and health of my hair.  What sets this curling iron apart for me is the Digital T3 SinglePass® Technology—it ensures even heat distribution, so I never had to worry about random hot spots frying my strands. The result? Beautiful, bouncy curls that actually last all day without needing to re-curl.  For anyone who travels a lot, the auto world voltage is a game-changer, making this my new go-to styling tool for vacations. Plus, the 1-hour auto off feature gives me serious peace of mind for those mornings when I’m rushing out the door.  All in all, the T3 SinglePass Curl X 1.25” feels like it was made for effortless, quick styling with long-lasting results. It’s sleek, intuitive, and gives me the perfect lived-in waves I’ve been craving. If you’re serious about getting salon-worthy curls from home, this is definitely worth investing in!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love the long barrel on this curling iron! The 1.25 is perfect for creating beach waves and looser curls. I love how easy it is to clamp down on the hair and slide down. My curls held all day and looked shiny without product!

This is my favorite curling wand and it works perfectly on my straight and medium hair. It is easy to use and has a very long lasting result. It keeps my hair in shape for whole day and shiny with out any fizzy

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This curling iron is the best and leaves the perfect loose curls i could ever ask for! i also love how easy it is to use this curling iron! i’m able to use this fast and easy and i love the white and rose gold on it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This curling iron is amazing! It is so cool and sleek and it gives you the perfect curls that truly last. I could not recommend it more highly-T3 is truly the best of the best when it comes to styling tools.

reviews.review_title: PERFECT FOR SOFT SMOOTH CURLS AND WAVES!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This size of barrel is perfect for mid size curls or waves! I have thick hair that sometimes is hard to curl, but with the different settings it has, it gives me the ability to lock in my hairstyle for the entire day!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This hair curler is one of the best I’ve ever used. If you’re really into a 90s blow out, my secret is to use a curler vs a hair dryer to achieve bouncy, voluminous hair. This really does the job with one pass and I find my hair to feel less damaged than when I’ve used other heat stylers in the past.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love anything from T3 as their hair tools set the standard for easy and efficient styling. This tool in particular is amazing as it has a longer than usual barrel which is amazing for my long hair. This leaves my hair perfectly curled and it is so easy to use. I love this thing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been such a huge fan of this brand since I tried one of their curling irons a few years ago now I’m almost addicted. I own every single one of the curling iron because I’ve never tried curling iron that have been so effective with my hair. What really sets these curling irons apart is the fact that they’re ceramic so the curls that they leave Look beautiful, shiny ear and just all around better

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: It gives my hair a strong burnt smell! I’m not even using it on high heat and I use a hair protective. I have seen several other comments saying the same thing. The smell is unbearable! Wish I could return

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I had high expectations after reading the positive reviews, but unfortunately, the product was not worth the price. I have long hair and the curls only lasted about 2 minutes. I will give it one more try before deciding to return it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Easy to use, doesn’t tear my hair. Gets hot fast and really hot too so be careful. My hair is less frizzy then using a straighter to curl. I won’t go back to the straighter after using this. You won’t regret buying

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This curling iron is perfect. it looks so sleek and the colors are perfect. it leaves my hair looking actually flawless, it took me some time to learn how to use it with the clamp but it’s amazing i really like

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my first time trying a product from t3hair and I am in love with it. The longer barrel definitely took a bit to get used to but it’s so easy to use now that I know how to. This makes my hair look so cute and I love that I can choose what heat setting is right for me

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This product was gifted by t3hair. The curling iron creates gorgeous, long-lasting curls with ease. Its adjustable heat settings make it suitable for all hair types, and its ceramic barrel ensures smooth, frizz-free curls every time. Plus, its sleek design and comfortable grip make styling a breeze. I highly recommend this curling iron to anyone looking to achieve salon-quality curls at home.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The singlepass curl is such a great tool for hair and addition to those who love to do hair! I was gifted by t3 hair Easy to use, heats up fast, left my mermaid waves so natural looking and my tighter curls perfect for my hairstyles id highly recommend

reviews.review_title: Perfect Effortless Curl for Long Hair
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This curling iron has been a game-changer for my long, hard-to-curl hair! It's single-pass feature also makes it a time-saver in my routine. The 1.25 barrel gives effortless salon-worthy curls that last. And that extra-long barrel? It's a blessing for my lengthy locks! Styling is a breeze, especially with the 9 heat settings that helped me find the perfect temperature without any hair disasters. My hair looks shiny and frizz-free every time. Plus, it's lightweight and travel-friendly, making it a must-have for any hair enthusiast. I grateful to have received this product complimentary from t3micro in exchange for my feedback.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This curling iron was offered by T3 Micro for an exchange of a review! In honesty, I AM OBSESSED WITH THIS CURLING IRON. I had a ton of curling irons, but this one hits the top spot. The curler is so good for long hair. I have noticed how much easier it is to curl my hair and how perfect the curls look! Not to mention the curling iron is so so cute 🫶

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Discovering a new way to curl my hair with my gifted by t3hair barrel has been so fun! This is the first clip curler I have used and it's so easy with the extended barrel they created along with the many heat options. I'm still learning to perfect the curls but the loose wavy curls it creates is stunning!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The T3 Singlepass curling iron gifted by t3hair is the best curling iron I’ve ever used. It’s so sleet and high quality. I get salon quality hairstyles every time I use it. It took me one or two times to get used to the clip barrel but I love it now.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: this product was gifted by t3hair to me in exchange for my honest review. I loved this curling iron, it heats up instantly, has multiple settings for heat, is easy to adjust, the tip isn’t hot to the touch. The barrel is long enough to hold long hair, it smoothed the frizz for me and the curls lasted a while. My favorite part is the heat settings, I have fine hair and try to use all tools on the lower heat. Great tool!

Gifted by t3micro but would purchase on my own. This is my go to curing iron now for a few reasons. It heads quickly and has different heat settings, it is easy to work with and the long barrel makes it easy for me to get the back of my head

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This curling iron was gifted by T3 micro! I AM ABSOLUTELY OBSESSED WITH THIS CURLING IRON. I have had many curling irons in the past, but this one is the best one I have ever tried. The curler is so long hair girl friendly. I also have noticed how much easier it is to curl my hair and how perfect the curls look! Not to mention the curling iron is so so cute 🫶

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am no professional at doing hair, but this was so easy for me to use. Even with my short hair I was able to add some nice waves and texture. The curling Iron is super nice quality and very pretty! I love the smooth texture and the dial at the bottom that changed the temperature and there are a lot of different temps levels. complimentary from t3micro

reviews.review_title: Must have for long thick hair
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely beyond happy with the results this curl wand. I have very long and thick hair and most curlers are a nightmare to use . This ones however did an amazing job . It was so easy to use and would highly recommend . Complimentary from T3.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This curling iron was gifted to me by t3hair. I’m glad I got the size that I did because my curls are big and bouncy. I’m still trying to get a hang of the clamp but I feel like I can get salon looking curls and it’s my favorite! I would highly recommend this product and I will definitely be purchasing a different size to try out as well. Love the heat that it gives off!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I’ll preface this by saying that I’m normally a curling wand girl and haven’t used a curler with a clamp in a long while. There was a bit of a learning curve but this curling iron was so incredibly smooth and easy to use once you get the hang of it! The 1.25 inch makes a pretty loose, natural curl/wave in my hair and is totally on trend! I received this item gifted by t3hair.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product. It’s easy to use and takes the guessing game out of figuring out what I’m going to do that day with my hair. I do have to prep my hair because my hair does not hold a curl, but I don’t mind as long as I can achieve the desired outcome. This was gifted by T3 but all opinions are my own.

This was gifted to me. This is the best curler I have ever owned. It didnt do damage to my hair its very sleek and cool! It goes up to really high temperatures and most importantly my curls lasted for 3 days!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Gifted by t3hair. I love this product. I have been using a curling wand for so long and I’ll never go back after using this T3 curler my curls lasted all day and still had great volume. I highly recommend purchasing this product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product was gifted by t3hair. This curling iron makes curling my hair so much easier! I have thick hair and it’s able to fully curl my hair very quickly. It heats up very quickly. I also love the sleek look of this iron. This is the only curling iron I am grabbing to get ready!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product was gifted to me by t3micro in exchange for my honest review. I have incredibly fine and straight hair, so curls usually don’t last longer than 30 minutes to an hour for me. I was pleasantly surprised that the curling iron from T3 actually works really well for my hair, and I’m very happy with it. 1.25” is a great size for beautiful curls that are not too big nor too small. The curls last long, even with touching and brushing my hair often. I can confidently recommend the T3 SinglePass Curl!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product complimentary from T3 but my obsession is my own! I have long half-Asian hair that is notoriously difficult to curl, because it’s so silky and thick. This is the best curler I’ve ever used! It feels so great in the hand, the dial is intuitive and easy to adjust, and I love that there aren’t any extra clips or parts to get stuck in my hair. The barrel just glides out. Curls lasted all day, even while I was running around hosting a party. 10/10!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have always had trouble with curling irons so this was kind of a turning point for me! I absolutely adore the curls and how easy it is to use?? The curls are effortlessly soft and just gorgeous! I love to wrap the top curls in rollers for extra volume! Gifted by T3hair!

reviews.review_title: Perfect curling iron for long hair
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love T3 and love this curler! Received gifted by T3 and was so excited to use on my long hair. Love the unique size of 1.25 for a pretty long curl. I will continue to use this as my primary curler regularly

reviews.review_buyer_description: Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: Gifted by t3micro but would buy with my own money .. Nothing but positive things to say: love how quickly it heats up, I love the different heat settings, I love the sleek design. I was concerned that the barrel would be too long for my hair but with mid length hair it was perfect. Made staying my hair quick and easy

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Gifted to me by T3 Micro. Let me start off by saying this heats up so so fast! I like how smooth my hair looks afterwards and doesn’t smell burnt. It has 9 heat settings and is very easy to use. I do recommend for the looser waves.

this curling iron has truly changed my hair styling routine. this is my new go to! i love thé length of the barrel considering i have longer hair. it’s also the perfect size for me at 1.25 in. the iron heats up quickly, has a sleek aesthetic, and leaves hair looking smooth and shiny. the curls last me about 3-4 days depending on my activity levels! would definitely recommend to anyone in the market. gifted by t3hair.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this curling iron. I have long hair and always struggled with the barrels not being long enough. This one is perfect! It heats quickly and gives a nice even curl that’s not too hot and holds all day. I was gifted by T3

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received the T3 single pass curling iron for free (gifted by t3hair) in exchange for my honest review and let me tell you how much I love this curling iron. It’s super easy to use, leaves my hair looking so shiny & healthy and the curls last for a week with just minor touch up throughout the week! I absolutely love it and highly recommend it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Gifted by T3 in exchange for a review. I am a beginner when it comes to curlers with a clamp. I’ve never been able to figure it out so I always have used a wand in the past. However, this curler with the extra long barrel is super easy to maneuver and it doesn’t pull my hair! So smooth and glides effortlessly. Love that there’s 9 different heat settings too based on your hair type and what you’re looking for!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great curler for thick hair! I loved that you dont need to have your hair in a perfect blowout to achieve beautiful waves with this curler. This was a great gift gifted by t3hair - i believe this will be my everyday curler from now on :) easy to use and beautiful waves without burning the hair so much. Perfect waves and my first time using this type of curler

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the sleek white design of the iron and how the smart twist dial glides. It heats up fast and I only have to use the 3rd lowest setting for my hair type. I find the extra-long barrel makes curling longer hair much easier, and the 1.25-inch barrel is perfect for beachy waves. It's lightweight and easy to use. Gifted to me in exchange for my honest review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely loved this product! Worth every penny, 10 out of 10!! I love how voluminous my curls were and how long they lasted. I feel like the curls are more like blowout curls, which I love! I love that I’m able to achieve these types of curls without a blow dryer. I did my mom’s hair and she loved it as well. She was really impressed that the curls lasted all night because she has really straight hair. Overall, this is a great product, and I would recommend this curling iron to everyone. This product was gifted by t3hair in exchange for my honest review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this curler!! Usually curling irons with clamps don’t work for me but this gave me the perfect beach curls 🥹 I love it so much because you could also use it as a wand curler for more wavey curls!! Gifted by t3hair

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I finally tried out this curling iron today after it was gifted by t3hair and I cannot say enough good things about it! I have fairly long hair, and I loved that I was able to get all of my hair on the curling iron! I also have super thick hair and did not feel it was necessary to have the heat all the way up like other irons! Definitely recommend, it’s a new must have!

I received this T3 SinglePass Curl X 1.25” as a gift offered by T3micro & I cannot say enough good things about this curling iron! It is so easy to use and has several heat settings for various hair types. I have medium thick hair and it takes me maybe 5-7 minutes to do my hair. The curls last all day too! I highly recommend this product to anyone looking for a go-to curling iron!

reviews.review_title: Honestly the best I’ve ever used!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product was gifted to me by t3hair and Im obsessed. I have fine but thick hair and very long. I loved that this curling iron had different temps for different hair types and made it easy to know which one was best for my hair type. Very user friendly! It’s also SO cute and I love the design! Would definitely recommend for anyone looking for a new curling iron!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Gifted by t3hair. Really impressed with the curling iron! I wasn’t sure how well it would work but my curls came out so well. It didn’t tug on my hair or anything. The curls came out better than I expected. I will say the curling iron itself is a bit weighty but overall I would recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: What sold me was the longer barrel by offered by t3micro! My hair is long and I want to curl one piece at full length. Which this does the job! I love that this is so light weight. Even though I have so much hair to curl my arm doesn't hurt holding up the tool. Not gonna lie. I have to YouTube some videos how to curl with a clip curler and need so more practice but even with this being my first time I think it looks great! The volume and softness is 👌🏻

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The curling iron offered by t3micro is absolutely gorgeous. I’m not super experienced with clamp curlers so my review is just from my first couple times using it. I can’t use the clamp without my hair crimping so I just wrap my hair around and hold it. However, I don’t think the curls hold very well (again I’m not very good with clamp curlers). But I hope once I get the hang of it I will enjoy it more.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Ummm yes… I am obsessed. My hair looks SO good. I get those perfect beachy wave curls. Tbh I’ve used a wand since like 2011 and this was a game changer. I will be using it so much. Great for a casual style or a fancy look! I was gifted by t3hair but I love it so much.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: my curls have never looked better. this 1.25 barrel is the perfect size to achieve luscious looking curls. the bounce i get now is amazing thanks to the ceramic quality of the barrel. love how you adjust the heat setting as well

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I’m enjoying my new t3 single pass 1.25 inch curler. It’s my favorite hair tool. It leaves my hair shiny and bouncy. I love how voluminous my curls are and long lasting. This product was gifted by t3 hair.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Super user friendly! I love the slick look of the wand and it worked really well on my hair. I love how easily you can adjust the heat levels and how you can achieve different curls with different techniques. The one thing I’ll say is you have to move quick because the clamp can crease your hair pretty easily. Overall great curler! Gifted by t3hair

reviews.review_title: A must try for curls or beach waves
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am absolutely obsessed. I have honestly never loved a curler and it’s not because it’s gifted by t3micro i genuinely used to think curlers weren’t for me until i tried this one. None of my curls have ever stayed or quite had the effect I wanted them too until t3 came into my life. The way this curls in one single pass and comes with detailed instructions on exactly the best temperatures needed for each hair type. It’s super aestethic too on my vanity and easy to use and super fast to warm. Never using another curler for my beach waves.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I style my hair every single day, so I was really happy to discover this curling iron, which was kindly gifted. by t3 The tool is sleek, modern, sturdy and vert easy to use. Both beginner and advanced user friendly.  My natural hair is fine, but I also useextensions, so the nine different heat settings are perfect for me, as I can adjust the heat for curling my fine hair vs a higher heat setting for the extensions part. The hair slips easily off when releasing, and also the longer than standard barrel is really practical as you get to heat the hair faster and more evenly than most hair tools!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This curling iron is so easy to use!! I love how big the barrel is, it gives a natural sleek curl. It heats up super quick which I absolutely love 😊😊🙌🏽🙌🏽this is definitely a must have curling iron for sure 😊I love it so much!! Offered by t3micro❤️

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This curling iron is the best I've ever used. I've never done my hair so quickly! The extra long barrel meant I could get more hair into each pass of the curling iron. Also, the 9 heat settings mean I didn't have to hold it in my hair that long. I really cant get over how easy it was to do my hair with this iron. It was also super smooth in my hair. I would buy this curling iron over and over and over again.  gifted by t3micro

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The product was gifted by T3 in exchange for my review. The design is fantastic, the white with rose gold details is very chic. You get plenty different different heat settings and an extra long barrel that makes it easy to curl long hair. You adjust the heat setting through a twist meachanism that's really intuitive. In terms of my experience, curling wand performed as advertised: it curled my hair evenly and left it glossy. I would recommend this if you don't mind spending a bit extra for an for an elegant iron with a long wand.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This curler was gifted by T3. This is my favorite new curler. It works really well on my long wavy hair. It heats up fairly quickly too and is very easy to use. It makes my curls look shiny and healthy. Love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This product was gifted by t3hair. This curler has been my go to hot tool. I have been very impressed considering that my hair is very straight and not many curlers work on me. The hold is good and my curls last a couple of days.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Gifted by t3hair. This curling iron is amazing! Im a beginner when it comes to curling my hair and this curling iron is super easy to use. It gives you really pretty curls that last for days. I would highly recommend it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this gifted by t3hair and it is now the new love of my life. The curls are perfect and it heats up genuinely so quick. My hair is sooooo long and the extra long barrel makes curling my hair so much easier

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was really excited to be gifted by T3 hair. I was sent their SinglePass extra long barrel curling iron. This iron offers the perfect features for my long hair. The longer barrel cut my curling time in half and the smooth glide is superior. There was no tugging or pulling on my hair. It offers 9 temperature settings. #6 was plenty hot for my long thick coarse hair. I should have started even lower as I did “burn” my hair a tad when I used it for the first time. Even with plenty of heat protection product. It is my recommendation to start on a lower setting than you think your hair requires. This is a beautiful luxe iron with really pretty gold accents.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve seen the brand advertised and it’s worth the hype! The curler heats up very quickly and has a wide range of temperatures. I like that is has a clamp, that offers a different curl style. Gifted by t3hair

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This product was gifted to me by T3 in an exchange for a review. I used this curling iron a few times and my curls and they did last all day. I didn’t have to use any setting spray or holding spray and the curls still stayed all day. I will definitely be adding this to my routine!

reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair
reviews.review_text: Gifted by t3hair but I honestly would’ve purchased this on my own eventually because of how awesome t3 is!!!! My long thick hair never once got pulled or stuck in the barrel and it took me less than 20 minutes to style all of my hair when in a hurry before work. It’s literally perfect!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was sent complimentary from t3micro single pass curl x 1.25 extra long barrel. The design is sleek and I like the extra long barrel. It heats up fast, and my hair holds the curl well. It has several heat settings but I find the 1st one is good for me. I have fine hair and the curl lasts. Overall I really like it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this curling iron. It’s so easy to use and I love that it has 9 different heat settings. I recieved the 1 1/4 inch barrel and I’m loving the loose beach waves I can create with this iron. I love the design of this iron! I love that it has a longer barrel. This helps me to be able to style my hair quicker. Offered by t3micro.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The detail put into this curling wand is amazing. It’s subtle but the little aesthetic node to keep your iron on the counter is genius. The temperature adjuster is very sleek. My hair is nearly down to my waist and the barrel is long enough to curl all my hair’s length in one go! Gifted by T3

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Completely in love with my T3 Single Pass Curl! It's effortlessly become my must-have tool for creating stunning waves. The convenience it offers is unmatched, effortlessly crafting beautiful waves in a single stroke. Maneuvering it is a breeze, and the outcome? Simply breathtaking. *Gifted by T3 hair

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: gifted by t3hair I’m beyond impressed with the T3 SinglePass Curl X 1.25” Ceramic Extra Long curling iron! The extra-long barrel makes styling my hair a breeze, and the ceramic material ensures my curls are frizz-free and shiny. Plus, the 1.25” size gives me versatile styling options, from loose waves to tight curls. Definitely worth every penny

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This was gifted to me by t3 hair and I was so excited to try it because I’ve always been a huge fan and let me tell you they nail it every time! This curling iron is perfect, the long barrel, 5 different heat settings, swivel cord, etc. literally everything about it is perfect you need it!

reviews.review_title: Super easy to use and adjust heat settings!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product was gifted by T3 hair! I am honestly so in love with the curl pattern this gives. I like a beachy wavy curl and this truly gives that. I’m used to a curling wand, but it was not hard to jump right into a curling iron with a clamp - this product made it easy. I love how you can adjust the heat settings by clicking the bottom. I would recommend this product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the best and easiest curler I have ever owned, my hair is currently short I have a bit of damage on my hair so I was worried this curler might cause some more but this was the easiest hair tool I’ve ever used it left my curls, so smooth and bouncy I couldn’t believe it!! I am so impressed with this hair curler I don’t think I’ll ever use a different one! If you have thin or curly hair curler for you!! also, this was the easiest tool I’ve ever used if you’re a beginner this is definitely perfect for you to try!! Gifted by t3

reviews.review_title: Great curling iron for long hair
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This was gifted by t3micro and I’m so grateful for it! The long barrel makes the curling process of my hair easy and quick. I don’t feel like it fried my hair during the process and I’ve noticed my curls last all day!! Obsessed

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was looking for a new curling iron and I am so happy I came across the T3 SinglePass! This tool is amazing quality which I’m sure will stand the test of time. The 9(!) heat settings make this iron suitable for every type of hair. Love it! (Gifted by T3)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is one of the best tools for curling you hair. Their tool’s quality and materials always amazing. The instructions is also so essy to follow. I can curl my hair in about 15 mins. It also makes my hair feel so smooth and my curls stays for long time Gifted by t3 micro

i’ve never used a t3 product before so this was super fun for me. i really liked the size of this curling rod and how easy it was to use! my curls have never looked so good and it gave a blow out look. gifted by t3

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Are you ready to elevate your hairstyling game? Look no further than the T3 SinglePass Curl X 1 1/4. As someone who has tried countless curling irons, I can confidently say that this tool has revolutionized my hair routine.  First and foremost, let's talk about efficiency. With the T3 SinglePass Curl X, I can achieve stunning waves in a fraction of the time it used to take me. Its innovative design and advanced technology ensure that each section of hair is evenly heated, resulting in consistent, long-lasting curls with just one pass. No more endless retouching or frustration with uneven curls – the T3 SinglePass Curl X delivers flawless results every time.  But what truly sets this curling iron apart is its versatility. Whether I'm aiming for tight, bouncy curls or loose, beachy waves, the T3 SinglePass Curl X effortlessly adapts to my desired look. The 1 1/4-inch barrel size is perfect for creating voluminous curls that hold their shape throughout the day, giving my hair that coveted salon-quality finish.  Another standout feature is the customizable heat settings. With five adjustable heat settings ranging from 260°F to 410°F, I have full control over the temperature, allowing me to tailor the heat to my hair type and texture. Plus, the auto world voltage ensures that I can achieve gorgeous curls wherever I go, making it the ultimate travel companion.  Not only does the T3 SinglePass Curl X deliver impeccable results, but it also prioritizes the health of my hair. The ceramic barrel and digital T3 SinglePass technology work together to seal the hair cuticle, minimizing damage and maximizing shine. Say goodbye to dry, frizzy curls – with the T3 SinglePass Curl X, my hair looks and feels healthier than ever before.  In conclusion, if you're in the market for a curling iron that delivers professional-quality results with minimal effort, look no further than the T3 SinglePass Curl X 1 1/4. Gifted by t3hair.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Gifted by t3hair. I love this curling iron so much!  So easy to use and the curls came out beautifully. I definitely will be using this to curl my hair more often, I have naturally thick curly hair and have a hard time finding a curling iron that works well for me usually but this one got hot enough and gave me the perfect sized curls

reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair
reviews.review_text: I received this product as a gift. gifted by t3micro. I love it! It’s so easy to use. The curls last awhile. Perfect curler! Beginner friendly. I recommend this curler to everyone! Works on all types of hair! LOVE

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: this curling iron is hands down my new go-to! Love that the barrel is so long and I can fit my whole stand from tips to roots in one twist without it getting bunched up! I can’t believe not only how fast it heated up, but it created lasting curls so fast! Was able to get my whole head curled in such a short period of time! Sleek design and feels high quality! - gifted by t3hair

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this curler so much. There’s 9 different heat setting so that is is really nice, it doesn’t always have to be on just one setting you can change it depending on your needs. The curls look so healthy and natural. The curls last all day which is amazing because I’ve struggled to find that, normally my curls start to fall out within the hour. It’s very simple and easy to use and I can curl all my hair so much quicker! I received this gifted by t3hair and will be using this for all my curling needs!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted by T3 SinglePass Curl X 1.25 and I am absolutely in love with it. The curler is heavy duty and doesn’t feel like it will break. I love that it has 9 different heat settings and the size of the barrel is perfect for big curls. I highly recommend purchasing this product!

reviews.review_text: When it comes to hair something that works for different hair textures is a must for me. I did all my girls hair with this for an event and the curls not only lasted, but maintained their beautiful shape. 😍  we loved it

reviews.review_text: I received this, gifted by t3hair, it is such a nice iron! I love the extra long barrel and the shape of the clamp is so smooth that it doesn’t dent your hair. Love how easy this is to use! The different heat settings are amazing also!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted by t3micro for this hair curler. I really like the size of the curls this curler provides me. This curler is really easy to use which is great for someone like me who is not the best at curling my hair.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely LOVE this curling iron! This was gifted by t3hair and I can honestly say this is a curling iron I will be using for years to come! I love that it has 9 different heat settings and works with all different types of hair! My hair is usually hard to keep a curl but with this curling iron my curls lasted all day!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was so amazed on how easy this curling iron is to  & how pretty my hair turned out. This device is fancy & sleek with an extra long barrel which is perfect for someone with long thick hair. It has 9 heat settings which is great for all hair types. The curls I was able to achieve using this curling iron amazed me. The curls were beautiful & lasted all day! Gifted by T3

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: T3 Single pass Curl X 1.25, gifted by t3hair.   I’m impressed by its sturdiness and solid build. With multiple heat settings, it quickly reaches the desired temperature. Even on the lowest setting, it creates beautiful curls for my hair that last throughout the day. The size of the curler is ideal for my shoulder-length hair. I like that it’s a high quality curler and I can only recommend it!

Gifted by T3micro! Thank you for gifting me. The curls that I got from this curling iron has been amazing! The barrel is perfect and easy to use! It is sleek, has so many different heat settings that keeps my beachy curls all day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Dry skin

Bid farewell to frizz and welcome salon-worthy curls effortlessly with this exceptional styling device. Gifted by T3hair.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin

I noticed that it heated up to setting 6 in under 2 minutes. Very easy to use and doesn’t snag the hair like other curling irons too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this gifted by t3hair. Curling my hair has just gotten so much easier!! I dont have to worry about frying it either with the smart heat settings based on my hair type. Love this curler and can’t wait to keep using it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin

reviews.review_text: Love the extra long barrel for doing my back hair with so much ease. It creates such beautiful soft shiny curls- I am a fan! And it always so many heat settings so you could do your hair with the least damage ! Gifted by t3hair

reviews.review_title: The best curling iron I’ve tried!
